item.title: Stuck with grandexchange buy command
item.dc:creator: @biteme2 biteme2
item.description:
@biteme2 wrote:

hey for the g/e im gonna edit the pickup command so write know it looks like

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 3) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
and ive changed it to look like

if (command.startsWith("buy") && playerRights >= 3) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); deleteItem(995, double shopValue;); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

how can i use the shop value of and item to take away form your money like asif you were buying it from a shop

Read full topic
